channel.title: Stock management on PrestaShop Specs
channel.description: Recent content in Stock management on PrestaShop Specs

item.title: Movements view
item.description: Movements view SearchIn this page firstly a text is presented: Search products (search by name, reference, supplier) Below the text there is a search input field for the search, a button on the right: “Search” is displaed. Below there is a drop-table with a placeholder “Advanced filters”, when pressed, a table below appears with the following: Filter by movement type, this is a drop-down field, when pressed, by default the options are: none, Employee edition.

item.title: Stock view
item.description: Stock management Search productsIn this page firstly a text is presented: Search products (search by name, reference, supplier) Below the text there is a search input field for the search, a button on the right: “Search” is displaed. Below there is a drop-table with a placeholder “Advanced filters”, when pressed, a table below appears with the following: Filter by supplier, this section had a search bar, and 2 check boxes.
